<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Investiture](/Feats.aspx?ID=795) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 262 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Charisma 16

</column>

---

You have an incredible ability to invest more magic items. Increase your limit on invested items from 10 to 12.
name: Incredible Investiture
